dict.acceptation: 灾难；彻底的失败；不幸；祸患；

sent.orig: The disaster social attribute mainly manifests in two aspects: the disaster cause and the disaster effect.
sent.trans: 灾害的社会属性主要体现在两个方面：致灾因子和灾害影响的社会性。

sent.orig: Let us pray sincerely for the disaster area people that salutes to the disaster area people!
sent.trans: 让我们真诚地为灾区人民祈祷，向灾区人民致敬！

sent.orig: An index system of lightning disaster assessment in Beijing is established based the disaster network analysis.
sent.trans: 在灾情网络分析的基础上，建立了北京市雷电灾害的灾情评估指标体系。

sent.orig: Please support our disaster relief, rehabilitation and disaster preparedness work in Haiti.
sent.trans: 请伸出援手，支持香港红十字会于海地提供紧急赈济、重建及备灾援助。

sent.orig: Climatic disaster of Macau mainly cause by typhoon and rain, other disaster is very few.
sent.trans: 澳门气候灾害主要是台风和暴雨灾害，其他灾害较少。
